R

readCommand(String, User) - Method in class game.GameController
Reads and distributes all incoming commands regarding the game.
ReaderThread - Class in client
It reads (for the client) the servers input constantly and prints it out on the console.
ReaderThread(Socket, ChatClient) - Constructor for class client.ReaderThread
Constructor of ReaderThread initializes the attributes socket and client and creates a BufferedReader which is wrap upon the InputStream of the Socket.
readResponse() - Method in class game.Round
The method reads the response, which is send from a player.
removePlayer(Player) - Method in class game.Round
If method is called, the given player is removed from the list of active players.
removePlayer(User) - Method in class game.GameBoard
If the user which disconnected is a player in the playerList, he gets removed from it.
removeUser(User) - Method in class game.GameController
removes a user from the gamer if he stops being a player in the game
removeUser(User) - Method in class server.ChatServer
This method removes a user from the list of users.
reset() - Method in class game.GameController
Method that resets the game controlling variables when a game has ended.
resetRound() - Method in class game.Player
Method clears the list of played cards in a round, the player is not guarded anymore.
Round - Class in game
This class is responsible for executing one single round.
Round(Player, ArrayList<Card>, ArrayList<Player>, GameBoard) - Constructor for class game.Round
Creates new round object.
run() - Method in class client.ReaderThread
run() method to start Thread and read input from the server and print it out on the console
run() - Method in class client.WriterThread
This method manages reading what the user is typing in its console.
run() - Method in class game.GameBoard
run method to start the Thread and start the game
run() - Method in class server.UserThread
The method runs a loop of reading messages from the user and sending them to all other users.
